name: distributionGroups_getApps
description: Get apps from a distribution group in an org

distribution_group_name.description: The name of the distribution group

$ul: **display_name**: The display name of the app
**icon_source**: The string representation of the source of the app's icon
**icon_url**: The string representation of the URL pointing to the app's icon
**id**: The unique ID (UUID) of the app
**name**: The name of the app used in URLs
**os**: The OS the app will be running on
**owner**: The information about the app's owner
**avatar_url**: The avatar URL of the owner
**id**: The unique id (UUID) of the owner
**name**: The unique name that used to identify the owner
**type**: The owner type. Can either be 'org' or 'user'
**release_type**: A one-word descriptive release-type value that starts with a capital letter but is otherwise lowercase
**origin**: The creation origin of this app
